name: tropical
content:

B2 geography, environment from or relating to the area between the two tropics: tropical fish a tropical island/region/climate Leprosy is one of the few tropical diseases which could soon be eradicated. She specializes in tropical medicine (= the treatment of diseases from the tropical areas of the world). The Amazon river basin contains the world's largest tropical rainforest. The hurricane was downgraded to a tropical storm when its speed dropped to 70mph. See also
subtropical
geography, environment
  informal extremely hot: The weather was positively tropical last summer.
More examplesFewer examplesDeforestation is destroying large areas of tropical rain forest.I dream of living on a tropical island.In cool climates you have to grow tropical plants under glass.The tropical butterfly's wings were shimmering with all the colours of the rainbow.The tropical sun beat down on them mercilessly.
